summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Contatti page (/contatti) - the final page of the multi-page rental boat website. All 14 specified features working perfectly including hero section, Dove Siamo with address and Google Maps, 4 distance cards, Orari section, contact cards with functional links, Come Arrivare section, Prenotazioni with 4 booking channels, Perche Noi with 6 reason cards, and final CTA section. Mobile responsiveness excellent. This completes 100% testing of all website pages.
passed_tests: Contatti page loads with hero and title 'Contatti'
Dove Siamo section with address card (Marina di Cala Mangiavolpe, Piazza Umberto I, 07024 La Maddalena SS)
'Apri in Google Maps' button present and functional
4 distance cards displayed correctly (300m traghetti, 100m supermercati, 30m Poste, 100m banca)
Google Maps embed visible and functioning
Orari section shows 09:00 apertura and 17:30 chiusura correctly
3 contact cards present: Telefono (+39 331 865 9946), WhatsApp (+39 389 094 9373), Email
All contact links functional with correct protocols (tel:, wa.me, mailto:)
WhatsApp CTA 'Risposta rapida' button present and working
Come Arrivare section with traghetto and auto arrival instructions
Prenotazioni section with 4 booking channels (Online, WhatsApp, Telefono, Di persona)
Perche Noi section with 6 reason cards displaying all benefits
Final CTA section with both WhatsApp and 'Chiama Ora' buttons functional
Navbar shows Contatti as active with turquoise highlighting
All phone/WhatsApp/email links properly formatted and functional
Mobile responsive layout works perfectly across all sections
Distance cards properly arranged in grid layout on mobile
Contact cards maintain proper spacing and clickability on mobile
Final CTA buttons accessible and properly styled on mobile
Floating WhatsApp button visible on mobile
Google Maps embed responsive and functional on mobile
All external links have proper security attributes (_blank, noopener noreferrer)
ScrollReveal animations working without console errors
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for automated testing
